resources.string: Align QR Code within frame to scan

Serial Number: %s 
 Firmware Version: %s
 System Version：%s
 App Version：%s
Please go to Menu - Add / Hide Assets to add assets you need
"The recovery phrase is used to restore your wallet. Use a Cobo Tablet to record your 24 recovery phrase words and store them securely."
Do not share your recovery phrase with anyone or take a picture of it. If it is lost or stolen, all assets are irretrievable.
Here is your %s public key （safe to share）
This address is only for %s, other digital assets sent to the above address will be lost.

Please visit: <font color="#00cdc3">https://cobo.com/hardware-wallet/firmware<font/> to check for firmware updates. If you are not using the latest firmware, download it from the official Cobo Vault website and save it on a TF card (FAT32 format, 32GB or less storage). Transfer the file to your device as shown in the image below. (TF card not included with purchase.)
2. Click on <font color="#00cdc3">\"Scan QR Code\" <font/>below and scan the QR code displayed on the website
3. Enter the code displayed on your Cobo Vault on the official website for authentication;
4. If authentication fails, do not use your device as it may have been compromised
I\'ve read and agreed to the <font color="#00cdc3"><u>\"Terms of Service\"</u><font/>, and <font color="#00cdc3"><u>\"Privacy Policy\"</u><font/>
1.Touch <font color="#00cdc3">\"Create Vault\"<font/> to generate a new Vault.
2.Touch <font color="#00cdc3">\"Import Vault\"<font/> to import an existing HD wallet.
Please enter your %d-word recovery phrase in the table below.
Must include upper and lower case letters and numbers.

Important Information:
1. The recovery phrase is the only way retrieve your assets. Please use record your recovery phrase carefully and store in a safe location.

2. Do not take photos of your recovery phrase or store on a device connected to the Internet. Do not share the recovery phrase with others.

3. Visit https://cobo.com/hardware-wallet/cobo-tablet to purchase a Cobo Tablet to store your recovery phrase with a higher degree of security.
Please enter your %d-word recovery phrase in the table below.
Scan <font color="#00cdc3">QR Code<font/> with Cobo Vault Mobile
recovery phrase incorrect, please try again.
Pattern does not match, please draw again.
Incorrect password, you have %d attempts remaining.
Too many incorrect attempts, \n try password unlock.
All data will be erased. This cannot be undone.
Passphrases cannot exceed 128 characters. Can consist of upper and lower case letters, digits, and symbols, but not spaces. Case Sensitive.

Important Information:\n1. When a Hidden Vault is created, its Passphrase cannot be changed. If the Passphrase is lost or forgotten, the Hidden Vault and all its assets will be irretrievable. Record and store the Passphrase securely before creating a Hidden Vault \n2. Keep the Passphrase field blank to enter the default Vault
Confirm to switch from current Vault to new Vault. You may return to any Vault by entering its correct Passphrase. Note that the Passphrase for the default HD wallet is blank
Incorrect password, you have %d chances left.
Please enter your %d-word recovery phrase in the table below.
Confirm to delete White List Address:%s？
To protect your assets, all information has been erased from your Cobo Vault. Please stop using this device and contact Customer Service immediately.\n Status Code:%s
Recovery phrase is incorrect, please try again.
Can only have up to 5 passphrase

Cobo Vault is an air-gapped hardware wallet that uses completely transparent QR code data transmissions so you can verify what goes in and out of it. Our Secure Element performs true random number generation (TRNG) to ensure your private keys come from real, physical sources of entropy. All transaction signing occurs entirely within the Secure Element, which has state of the art defenses to protect you in the event that an attacker has physical access to your device.
Addresses may not be deleted once created. Please choose a name you will be able to recognize.
This device is no longer safe to use!
Slide to adjust the screen brightness
Scan QR code with Cobo Vault Mobile to broadcast the transaction to the blockchain
Creating Vault, please keep screen on.
Someone has attempted to hack your device!

Your device has been attacked and may have been compromised. By continuing to use this device, you are risking the disclosure of sensitive information and loss of your assets. We strongly recommend you erase all personal information on the device and contact Customer Service immediately.
Once a Vault is created, the recovery phrase will not be displayed again!
Users only can send assets to the addresses stored on the white list. While the white list is empty, all transactions are prohibited.

1. If you have generated an address from your Pub Key, you can send and receive funds on Cobo Vault mobile, and your account information will be automatically synchronized when you sign in with this device.\n2. If you haven’t generated an address, you can invite a friend with %s to scan this Pub Key and generate an address.
Anyone with your recovery phrase has full access to your cryptocurrency. Please make sure there are no onlookers or cameras when you record your recovery phrase.
Must contain at least 10 characters and include upper and lower case letters and digits. Symbols are allowed. Case sensitive.

You can create Passphrase(Hidden Vault) or reset your password in Settings. \n Read the enclosed Quick Guide or visit our website to learn more:
https://cobo.com/hardware-wallet/cobo-vault
Only install firmware upgrades downloaded from the official Cobo Vault website.

The recovery phrase is the only way to retrieve your assets and password. If it is lost, your assets are irretrievable and the device may be locked! (The recovery phrase will not be displayed again after initialization of the device.)
Please input the verification code into the official website\'s Web Authentication page to have your device authenticated.
Device power level needs to be above %s to ensure the upgrade is successful. Current battery level is %s, please replace or charge the battery.
A new version %s is available for update. Compare the following sha256 with the sha256 of your download package on the official website, ensure that they are consistent, then click "Update Now"
Invalid QR Code! Please check and retry.
Hot end and cold end do not match. Please check that they been correctly bound.
Invalid QR Code. Please follow the instruction to scan the correct QR Code to complete authentication.
Difficulty scanning? Tap the QR code to enlarge.
Place your finger on the fingerprint sensing area and remove it when you feel a vibration. Repeat until enrolling process is fully complete.
Place your finger on the fingerprint sensing area and press slightly.
Fingerprint can be used to sign transactions or unlock device.
Mobile app version does not match. Please update your Cobo Vault firmware.
Wrong Password. This device will be wiped.
No Result\nPlease input the keywords of Signature
No Result\nPlease input address or the keywords of name
Pattern password is used to unlock the vault
You can also go to [Menu > Settings > Version] and touch “Update Now” later.
Are you sure you want to permanently wipe the device?

1. Open Electrum and create a new wallet. 
2. Choose “Standard wallet”. 
3. Choose “Use a master key”. 
4. Touch “Show Master Public Key” below then click the camera icon in the “Create keystore from a master key” window in Electrum to scan the QR code that displays on Cobo Vault. 
5. Set a password. 
6. Enter the watch-only wallet.
How to create a watch-only wallet in Electrum:
Please make sure you have inserted a FAT32 format microSD card with capacity 32GB or less
Please make sure the file you wish to sign was successfully saved to your microSD card.

In Electrum, go to Tools > Load Transaction > From QR Code\n\nDifficulty scanning? You can export the signed transaction data as a file using a microSD card and broadcast the transaction from a file with Electrum.

1. Open Electrumand and create a new wallet.
2. Choose “Standard wallet”.
3. Choose “Use a master key”. 
4. Click the camera icon in the “Create keystore from a master key” window in Electrum to scan the QR code that displays on Cobo Vault.

Difficulty scanning? You can also export the master public key file using a microSD card.
Unable to read file, please try importing again.
In Electrum, go to Tools > Load Transaction > From File to open the file.
Please make sure you have inserted a FAT32 format microSD card with capacity 32GB or less.
Open when inputting your master public key on Electrum.
Scan the QR code with Electrum to broadcast
Scan master public key using Electrum
How to broadcast with Electrum:\nIn Electrum, go to Tools > Load Transaction > From File. Open the file, and click “Broadcast”.

Difficulty scanning?Tap the QR code to enlarge
or touch here to export via microSD.
Difficulty scanning? You can import pending transactions from Electrum using a microSD card (Menu > MicroSD Card).
Transaction not recognized. Your Cobo Vault has not been successfully paired with the watch-only wallet.
You have rolled %d times. We recommend you roll 99 times for 256-bit
You have rolled %d times. You need at least 50 rolls to generate a recovery phrase.

How to use dice to generate keys:

1. Roll the dice at least 50 times. Roll 99 times to obtain 256-bit entropy (recommended). There is no limit to the number of rolls you can use.
2. We recommend you use casino dice to increase the entropy of each dice throw.
To prevent peeping, track will be hidden when unlocked
Detect that the transaction is risky and cannot be signed. You can go to: https// for details, or contact us: support@cobo.com
You have signed the transaction, can broadcast the transaction directly
*Cobo will never ask for your Recovery Phrase under any circumstances, please be sure to keep your Recovery Phrase and don’t disclose them to anyone
The entered recovery phrase does not match the one in the Cobo Vault. Do not reset the device until a valid backup was verified.
You have entered an invalid recovery phrase, please try again.
The entered recovery phrase matched the one in the Cobo Vault.

You have successfully upgraded to the latest version. To protect your assets, the Vault automatically resets to the default vault every time the device is restarted. (Also when it upgrades, shuts down or is restarted.)
Entering the default vault, please keep screen on.
You need to enter the recovery phrase of this vault when adding %s.For details, please visit: https://cobo.com/%s
The entered recovery phrase does not match the one in the Cobo Vault. Please try again.

1. You have built %1$d/%2$d Shamir Backup. It\'s a Shamir Backup with %3$d shares and you need %4$d shares at least to recovery your wallet.

2. Next you will need to confirm each share. If all the shares are kept by a different person, please confirm that each confirmation is performed by the specific person.

3. Please don\'t take photos of the shares, or store it online. Don\'t share it to anyone else or you risk losing your funds.
Please confirm you are the custodian of the share #%d
Please enter the recovery phrase for <font color="#00cdc3">share #%d<font/> in the form below
The recovery phrase of this share was verified successfully, now proceed to the next share. Touch confirm and hand over to the second share custodian who keeps share number #%d.
The first share enter successfully, %d more shares needed to enter.
Share already entered, please enter a different share.
You have entered a share from another Shamir Backup.
The confirmed share will be lost after cancelling. Are you sure you want to cancel?
You have entered Super Shamir (two-level configuration of Shamir Backup), Cobo Vault doesn’t support it currently.
The confirmed share will be lost after cancelling. Are you sure you want to cancel?
Check the Vault with Single Backup
Check the Vault with Shamir Backup
Import a Vault with Single Backup
Import a Vault with Shamir Backup
Create a Vault with Shamir Backup
Create a Vault with Single Backup
Please restart or contact us at support@cobo.com\n Status Code:%s
Erase all Information and Power off
It is recommended that you wipe the device and then reset it.Repeated retries failed, you can contact us：support@cobo.com\n Status Code:%s
